name: Scratch...
description:
*NOTE: THIS GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS AND IS NOT AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC AND IS NOT A FINISHED GAME. PLEASE SUPPORT THE DEVOLOPER BY GIVING FEEDBACK TO THE DEVELOPER OF THE GAME.*

Hi! This a FNaF Fangame I made called Scratch... It plays basically the same as FNAF: Move your mouse around, click on stuff, don't die. 

In case you've never used scratch before, here are the games characters:

Scratch (The cat)

Pico (The orange guy)

Giga (The red one)

Tera (The blue one) 

Gobo: (The blob-ish yellow one)
